DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , multicenter , observational assessment safety effectiveness LVIS® device treatment wide neck intracranial aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: TRAIL : Treatment Intracranial Aneurysms With LVIS® System
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient patient 's legally authorize representative inform confidentiality study agree collection his/her personal data 2 . Patient rupture unruptured intracranial aneurysm : The parent artery diameter ≥ 2.0mm ≤ 4.5 mm ; The aneurysm neck size ≥ 4mm dometoneck ratio < 2 ( wide neck ) Endovascular treatment coil one LVIS® device determine necessary patient multidisciplinary team 3 . Patient age ≥ 18 year 4 . Patient present WFNS score 0 3 5 . Patient agree attend followup appointment 1 . The use endovascular stent LVIS® determine necessary 2 . Patient present medical surgical comorbidities limit his/her life expectancy le one year 3 . Patient contraindication platelet inhibition treatment 4 . Patient require retreatment aneurysm previously treat stent 5 . Patient pregnant 6 . Patient multiple aneurysm treat one procedure
